committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation

official_title: A bill entitled the "Aleutian World War II National Historic Areas Act of 1996".
short_title: Aleutian World War II National Historic Areas Act of 1996

summary.text: Aleutian World War II National Historic Areas Act of 1996 - Designates areas on the island of Amaknak, Alaska, to comprise the Aleutian World War II National Historic Area. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to award grants and provide technical assistance to the Ounalaska Corporation and the city of Unalaska for planning, development, and historic preservation.

titles.title: Aleutian World War II National Historic Areas Act of 1996
A bill entitled the "Aleutian World War II National Historic Areas Act of 1996".
